attributes.additional_details:
The MPs keep stating  that if everyone take the vaccine then things will go back to normal, so why aren't they taking it then
If the general population is expected to take this vaccine then why haven't the PMs not taken up the offer themselves.
Let's ask the MPs to lead by example and if they are not willing to do so, then how can they ask us to.
attributes.background:
Take the vaccine so they can go back to parliament and do their jobs.
They should lead by example and then the public may follow
So I would like to start this petition to get both MPs and the public talking about the vaccine issues.
